title: Dean's List
description: Received 7 Dean's List Honors nominations for outstanding academic performance in all undergraduate semesters, having attained a minimum of 3.5 GPA for each semester.

title: Certificate of Recognition
description: Recognized for my role as Co-President for CICSoft and continued work as a leader strengthening our community.

title: Certificate of Recognition
description: Recognized for my role as Co-Director for HackUMass and continued work as a leader strengthening our community.

title: Intern of the Month
description: Deemed the Intern of the Month for exemplary work performance and initiative taken personally in the capacity of a business development associate, during the month of August.

title: AP Scholar with Distinction
description: Awarded the AP Scholar with Distinction Award for achieving an average score of at least 3.5 on all AP Exams taken, and scores of 3 or higher on five or more exams.

title: Chancellor's Award
description: Awarded the Chancellor's Award annual merit scholarship of $14,000, reserved specifically for international students, on admission to the University of Massachusetts Amherst.

title: Academic Gold Medal
organization: Delhi Public School, R. K. Puram
description: Awarded a Gold Medal for 7 consecutive years of academic excellence from 5th grade to 11th grade, obtaining 80% aggregate or more each year with 75%+ attendance.

title: Extracurricular Gold Medal
organization: Delhi Public School, R. K. Puram
description: Awarded a Gold Medal for excelling in the field of aerospace, through participation and achievements in Space Settlement Design Competitions and other aerospace/aviation challenges.

title: Winner
description: Won the 25th Annual International Space Settlement Design Competition (ISSDC), hosted at Kennedy Space Center, as a member of Team Oberth in Grumbo Aerospace company.

title: Alternate Finalist
description: Received the spot of Alternate Finalist (one of top 7 teams globally) for proposing our product Ares in the Aerospace and Aviation category of the 2018 edition of the Conrad Spirit of Innovation Challenge.

title: Runners-Up
description: Came runners-up in the 14th Annual Asian Regional Space Settlement Design Competition (ARSSDC), hosted at Om Shanti Retreat Center, Manesar, as a member of Team Coriolis in Vereinigten Flugfahrten company.

title: First Prize
description: Won the first prize in the 2017 edition of the NASA Ames Space Settlement Design Contest, as the structural developer and 3D-modeler of Project Avanoa, in a team of 5 members.

title: Runners-Up
description: Came runners-up in the 13th Annual Asian Regional Space Settlement Design Competition (ARSSDC), hosted at Om Shanti Retreat Center, Manesar, as a member of Team Alexiares in Dougeldyne Astrosystems & Flechtel Constructors company.

title: Second Prize
description: Won the second prize in the 2016 edition of the NASA Ames Space Settlement Design Contest, as the structural design engineer of Project Novigo, in a team of 5 members.
